title: How to Make Pumpkin Muffins

steps.headline: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F or 205 degrees C.
Spray 12 muffin cups with nonstick cooking spray or line with paper cupcake liners.
Add the eggs to small mixing bowl and whisk to combine.
Add the pumpkin, buttermilk (or plain yogurt), and vegetable oil to a mixing bowl.
Whisk together the dry ingredients.
steps.description: Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients.

steps.headline: Add the egg mixture to the well.
Fold in the raisins or dried cranberries.
Spoon the batter evenly amongst the muffin cups.
Bake the muffins for 18 to 20 minutes or until a wooden toothpick inserted in the muffin center comes out clean.

text: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F or 205 degrees C.  Spray 12 muffin cups with nonstick cooking spray or line with paper cupcake liners.  Add the eggs to small mixing bowl and whisk to combine.  Add the pumpkin, buttermilk (or plain yogurt), and vegetable oil to a mixing bowl. Mix to combine. Whisk together the dry ingredients. Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients. Add the egg mixture to the well. Mix until just combined. Fold in the raisins or dried cranberries.  Spoon the batter evenly amongst the muffin cups.  Bake the muffins for 18 to 20 minutes or until a wooden toothpick inserted in the muffin center comes out clean.
